title: Teak bed (Mahogany Homes)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The teak bed can be built in the bed space in a clients house during Mahogany Homes. It requires 50 Construction to build and when built, it gives 216 experience. The player must have a hammer and a saw in their inventory to build it.

The teak bed can be built in the bed space in a clients house during Mahogany Homes. It requires 50 Construction to build and when built, it gives 216 experience. The player must have a hammer and a saw in their inventory to build it.

The '''teak bed''' can be built in the [[bed space (Mahogany Homes)|bed space]] in a clients house during [[Mahogany Homes]]. It requires 50 [[Construction]] to build and when built, it gives 216 [[experience]]. The player must have a [[hammer]] and a [[saw]] in their inventory to build it.
